Yang Hyong Sop Meets Cuban Ambassador
   Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Cuban Ambassador to the DPRK Ruben Perez Valdes who paid a farewell call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.
